Class CreateDocuments

  • java.lang.Object
    • datageneration.Documents
      • datageneration.CreateDocuments
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CreateCategoryDocuments, CreateTagsDocuments

    public abstract class CreateDocuments
extends Documents
    Abstract class templates each of the different forms of data the system will extract from the database.

      • CreateDocuments

        public CreateDocuments(java.lang.String target,
               CapstoneDBConnection con)
                throws java.io.IOException,
                       java.sql.SQLException
        Extract, analyse and export data from database. This constructor functions more as a main method (calling methods in order) than a typical object constructor which initialises fields.
        Parameters:
        target - What type of documents need to be created
        con - Connection to the db
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.sql.SQLException

      • makeDocuments

        protected void makeDocuments(java.lang.String target)
                      throws java.io.IOException,
                             java.sql.SQLException
        Creates the documents for each user for the given target data. Each document consists of all a user's artifacts in a random order
        Specified by:
        makeDocuments in class Documents
        Parameters:
